---
category: news
title: "White Castle, Miso Robotics expand partnership"
excerpt: "The Flippy 2 robotic arm designed and built by Miso Robotics will be installed in more White Castle restaurants. The fast-food chain announced plans to install Flippy 2 in 100 stand-alone locations. Rollouts of Flippy 2 will be phased in by region and planned out and scheduled in the months and years ahead."
